item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 27, 2024 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:

15. Carma (YC W24) hiring founding SWEs (remote) to build the next Uber for auto repair ( | hide)

26. We can now fix McDonald's ice cream machines (1049 points | 280 comments)
27. New Windows driver signature bypass allows kernel rootkit installs (266 points | 199 comments)
28. Ion engines could take us to the solar gravitational lens in less than 13 years (64 points | 56 comments)
29. The Japanese word ikigai refers to a passion that gives joy to life (2022) (192 points | 104 comments)
